data.caption: Volume Movement Letter
data.news_body: We refer to the captioned email received by the company from BSE Limited today i.e. on December 3 2025 regarding an increase in the volume of its shares. The Company has made all the necessary disclosures pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 that have a bearing on the operations/performance of the Company which include all price sensitive information and has not withheld any material/price sensitive information that in its opinion could have bearing on the volume behavior of the scrip. Therefore the said increase in volume of shares of the company is purely market driven and due to market conditions.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Birlasoft Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Birlasoft Ltd on December 03 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Clarification With Respect To Spurt In Volume
data.news_body: We refer to the captioned email received by the Company from NSE yesterday i.e. on December 2 2025 regarding spurt in volume of its shares. The Company has made all the necessary disclosures pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 that have a bearing on the operations/performance of the Company which include all price sensitive information and has not withheld any material/ price sensitive information that  in its opinion would have bearing on the volume behavior of the shares. Therefore the said increase in volume of shares of the Company is purely market driven and due to market conditions.
